select T2.BRANCHNAME, T2.DEPTNAME, T1.SALEDATE, T1.SALEID, T2.KNAME, T1.CONNAME, T1.CONJUMINID, (SELECT ( CASE BRROWTYPE WHEN 'N' THEN '월지급' WHEN 'Y' THEN '년지급' END ) AS BRROWTYPE FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS BRROWTYPE, (SELECT BrrowPeriod FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) || (SELECT DCODENAME FROM sy_ccodedtl WHERE CCODE = '011' and dcode = (SELECT PeriodGubun FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) ) AS BRROWTERM, (SELECT BRROWAMT FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS BRROWAMT, (SELECT PAYRATE FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS PAYRATE, (SELECT PAYAMT FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS PAYAMT, (SELECT (PayAmt - (PayAmt * 0.25) - ((PayAmt * 0.25) * 10)) AS TAXAMT FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS TAXAMT, (SELECT (PAYAMT - (PayAmt - (PayAmt * 0.25) - ((PayAmt * 0.25) * 10))) AS JIGUEBAMT FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS JIGUEBAMT, (SELECT EXPIREDATE FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS EXPIREDATE, (SELECT EXTENDYN FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS EXTENDYN, (SELECT EXTENDDATE FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS EXTENDDATE, (SELECT CANCELYN FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS CANCELYN, (SELECT CANCELDATE FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS CANCELDATE, (SELECT ADDRESS FROM mm_buymst WHERE BUYID = T1.BUYID) AS ADDRESS, (SELECT BankName FROM sy_bankmst WHERE bankcode = (SELECT paybank FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID)) AS BANKNAME, (SELECT PAYACCOUNT FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS PAYACCOUNT, (SELECT PAYOWNER FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS PAYOWNER, (SELECT REMARK FROM sa_salebdtl WHERE SALEID = T1.SALEID) AS REMARK from sa_salemst T1, (SELECT INSACODE, KNAME, BRANCHCODE, (SELECT BRANCHNAME FROM ba_branchmst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T3.BRANCHCODE) AS BRANCHNAME, DEPTCODE, (SELECT kname FROM hr_insamst WHERE BRANCHCODE = T3.BRANCHCODE AND DEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE and duty='002') AS DEPTNAME FROM hr_insamst T3 WHERE 1=1
AND BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
AND KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
) T2, (select buyid from mm_payscheduletb where 1=1 and paygubun = '005' and payyn <> 'Y') T4 where 1=1 and T1.buyid = T4.buyid
AND T1.SALEGUBUN = #S_DCODE#
AND T1.SALEDATE BETWEEN #S_SALEDATE_FR# AND #S_SALEDATE_TO#
ORDER BY T1.SALEID ASC
